pageContent: Objectives: To investigate the relationship between diet and prostate cancer (CaP) among native Japanese (NJ) and second-generation or third-generation Japanese-American (J-A) men--focusing on the effects of animal fat and soy on prostatic tissues.

metaData.source:
Andropause syndrome in men treated for metastatic prostate cancer: a qualitative study of the impact of symptoms
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21558849/
